price: Бигӯ: «Бе гумон, ман наметавонам ба шумо зиёне бирасонам ва на хайру суде»
arabic: قُلۡ إِنِّي لَآ أَمۡلِكُ لَكُمۡ ضَرّٗا وَلَا رَشَدٗا

version.title: Tajik translation - Arfy
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Tajik by Rowwad Translation Center with cooperation with Islamhouse.com

meta.transliteration: qul innī lā amliku lakum ḍarran walā rashadan
